title: Global Job Opportunities with Turing: Math Enthusiasts, This One's for You!
description: Explore how Turing is opening doors for talented individuals around the world with opportunities to work remotely on cutting-edge AI projects. This episode highlights a special job opportunity for math enthusiasts and professionals in non-US countries.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: Hello and welcome to another episode of 'life is artificial', where we explore the cutting edge of technology, innovation, and what the future could look like.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: Today, we're going to talk about job opportunities that are perfect for people with a love of mathematics, and how a company called Turing is creating real opportunities for individuals around the world, regardless of their geographic location.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: Turing is a fully remote company based in Palo Alto, California, with over 500 team members. They focus on connecting talented professionals to top companies and helping them build, train, and scale AI technologies. Whether it's advanced generative AI, large language models, or custom engineering solutions, Turing is right at the forefront of making AGI—artificial general intelligence—a reality.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: The most exciting part about Turing is their commitment to sourcing talent globally. If you're tuning in from outside the United States, maybe in Europe, Asia, Africa, or South America, this is for you. Turing's approach isn't limited by borders. They actively source and vet talent from across the globe, ensuring that the best people get the best opportunities, no matter where they live.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: One opportunity we're highlighting today is a position for a Mathematics Quality Analyst. If you're someone who has a knack for math and problem-solving, and you're comfortable with high school-level concepts like algebra, trigonometry, and calculus, this might be just the right fit for you.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: Now, what's particularly interesting about this role is that it doesn't require a specialized background beyond strong math skills. You'd be solving math problems, explaining the solutions clearly, and helping to improve AI algorithms that rely on these fundamental mathematical principles. It's flexible, it's remote, and it comes with competitive pay—pretty great if you ask me.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: Turing uses a mix of proprietary AI and machine learning to build connections between talented professionals and top-tier companies. This means that if you join Turing, you'll be working on projects that are pushing the envelope of what AI can do, alongside some of the most innovative companies in the world. And you get to do all of this from the comfort of your own home—whether that home is in Mumbai, Nairobi, Sofia, or anywhere else.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: And for those of you who might be thinking—well, I don't have a degree in mathematics or engineering—don't worry. Turing is open to candidates who can demonstrate their skills, even without formal qualifications. So, if you've got a talent for math, and you're able to creatively solve problems and explain your thinking clearly, this could be your chance to step into an exciting role within the AI space.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: To apply, there's an online math assessment, followed by an interview, and maybe a mock teaching session. It's straightforward, and Turing wants to make sure they find people who are not only capable of solving problems but can also share their knowledge effectively.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: What's amazing about this opportunity is the potential for growth. Turing isn't just offering a job; they're offering a chance to be part of the AI revolution. You'll have the chance to work alongside some of the brightest minds, contribute to the development of large language models, and perhaps make a real difference in how AGI shapes our future.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: So, if you're a math enthusiast, looking for a remote job with a global technology leader, I really recommend checking out this position. It's a rare opportunity to do something meaningful with your skills—regardless of where you're based.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: For more information on how to apply, you can check out the job listing directly at Turing's website. I'll leave the link in the show notes for you.

script.speaker: Host
script.text: That's all for today's episode of 'life is artificial'. If you enjoyed this episode, please subscribe, share, and let your friends know. And if you're applying for the role, I wish you the best of luck—go out there and show what you can do!

script.speaker: Host
script.text: Until next time, stay curious, stay inspired, and keep exploring the incredible world of technology and artificial intelligence.
